009
010package imagingbook.pub.color.filters;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013
014import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterVector;
015import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
016import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm;
017import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
018
019/**
020 * Basic vector median filter for color images implemented
021 * by extending the {@link GenericFilterVector} class.
022 * 
023 * @author W. Burger
024 * @version 2020/12/31
025 */
026public class VectorMedianFilter extends GenericFilterVector {
027        
028        public static class Parameters extends ScalarMedianFilter.Parameters {
029                /** Distance norm to use */
030                public NormType distanceNorm = NormType.L1;
031                
032                /** For testing only */
033                public boolean showMask = false;
034                /** For testing only */
035                public boolean markModifiedPixels = false;
036                /** For testing only */
037                public Color modifiedColor = Color.black;
038                
039        }
040        
041        private final Parameters params;
042        private final CircularMask mask;
043        private final int maskCount;
044        final int[][] maskArray;
045        final int xc, yc;
046        private final float[][] supportRegion;          // supportRegion[i][c] with index i, color component c
047        private final VectorNorm vNorm;
048        private final float[] pTmp = new float[3];      // check, adapt to depth
049        private final float[] modColor;
050        
051        public int modifiedCount = 0; // for debugging only
052        
053        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054        
055        public VectorMedianFilter() {   
056                this(new Parameters());
057        }
058        
059        public VectorMedianFilter(Parameters params) {
060                this.params = params;
061                this.mask = new CircularMask(params.radius);
062                this.maskCount = mask.getCount();
063                this.maskArray = mask.getMask();
064                this.xc = this.yc = mask.getCenter();
065                this.supportRegion = new float[maskCount][3];
066                this.vNorm = params.distanceNorm.create();
067                
068                this.modColor = params.modifiedColor.getRGBColorComponents(null);
069                if (params.showMask) Utils.showMask(this.mask, "Mask-" + this.getClass().getSimpleName());
070        }
071        
072        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
073        
074        @Override
075        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
076                final float[] pCtr = pack.getVec(u, v);
077                getSupportRegion(pack, u, v);
078                double dCtr = aggregateDistance(pCtr); 
079                double dMin = Double.MAX_VALUE;
080                int jMin = -1;
081                for (int j = 0; j < supportRegion.length; j++) {
082                        float[] p = supportRegion[j];
083                        double d = aggregateDistance(p);
084                        if (d < dMin) {
085                                jMin = j;
086                                dMin = d;
087                        }
088                }
089                float[] pmin = supportRegion[jMin];
090                // modify this pixel only if the min aggregate distance of some
091                // other pixel in the filter region is smaller
092                // than the aggregate distance of the original center pixel:
093                final float[] pF = new float[3];        // the returned color tupel
094                if (dMin < dCtr) {      // modify this pixel
095                        if (params.markModifiedPixels) {
096                                copyPixel(modColor, pF);
097                                modifiedCount++;
098                        }
099                        else {
100                                copyPixel(pmin, pF);
101                        }
102                }
103                else {  // keep the original pixel value
104                        copyPixel(pCtr, pF);
105                }
106                return pF;
107        }
108        
109        private void getSupportRegion(PixelPack src, int u, int v) {
110                // fill 'supportRegion' for current mask position
111                int k = 0;
112                for (int i = 0; i < maskArray.length; i++) {
113                        int ui = u + i - xc;
114                        for (int j = 0; j < maskArray[0].length; j++) {
115                                if (maskArray[i][j] > 0) {
116                                        int vj = v + j - yc;
117                                        copyPixel(src.getVec(ui, vj, pTmp), supportRegion[k]);
118                                        k = k + 1;
119                                }
120                        }
121                }
122        }
123        
124        // find the color with the smallest summed distance to all others.
125        // brute force and thus slow
126        private double aggregateDistance(float[] p) {
127                double d = 0;
128                for (int i = 0; i < supportRegion.length; i++) {
129                        d = d + vNorm.distance(p, supportRegion[i]);
130                }
131                return d;
132        }
133}
